entry.title: Marble Arch Mound (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Marble Arch Mound (pictured) in central London looks like the hill in Teletubbies?

entry.title: Digimon Adventure (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that director Mamoru Hosoda's original concept for his 1999 film Digimon Adventure was a story set against the backdrop of the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo?

entry.title: lined sea hare (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that reproductive success in the lined sea hare can be reduced by noise pollution?

entry.title: Alexander Gordon (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that brewer Alexander Gordon paid to build the Polhollick Bridge in Aberdeenshire in 1892 after witnessing a drowning incident at the ferry crossing?

entry.title: Hurricane Pali (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in 2016, Hurricane Pali and Hurricane Alex existed simultaneously as rare January hurricanes within the Pacific and Atlantic hurricane basins, respectively, marking the first such occurrence on record?

entry.title: Florian Boesch (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a reviewer wrote that Florian Boesch's 2011 recording of Winterreise with Malcolm Martineau was "one of the most powerful lieder albums of recent years"?

entry.title: South Bronx Greenway (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the South Bronx Greenway includes recycled granite from the Willis Avenue Bridge?

entry.title: Best Sex I've Ever Had (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Donald Trump had a "big smile plastered on his face" on the day the "Best Sex I've Ever Had" happened?

entry.title: 新疆新增3名感染者：病毒来源成谜 (快科技)

entry.title: 无底线 主播带燃气做饭蹲守全红婵家：日最高进村600人 (快科技)
entry.content: 东京奥运会上的3跳满分夺冠，让14岁的全红婵一鸣惊人。 夺冠之后，彻底改变了全红婵的人生轨迹。随之而至的，还有社会各方“用力过猛”的关爱。 除了给她送去无数辣条的网友、送慰问
